column4: so plz if anybody could help, i would really appreciate it =(
I have a USB mouse that does not work
omg how much memory is to be used by my video card?
i left mine blank but that depends ont he memoery of your card
i can try leaving it blank?
on the box it will tell you. just leave it blank if you dont know
yes or no to "Use kernel framebuffer device interface" - it has no selected, but it says enabling it is the safe bet, but that you can turn it off if it causes problems?
it is a laptop not a CRT - should I do simple, medium or advanced to slect my monitor characteristics?
i have a 15.4 in widescreen, i think... it autoselect 17 in in the simple setup, should i say ok?

I am still using the install as it was from the CD, no software updates, should I let it update the xserver-xorg-core and xserver-xorg-input-mouse like it wants to, or will that break my nice freshly working mouse?
